name: zaje
description:
Hide in your briefs after rolling the dice! Zombies will appear to kill you ... defend yourself as much as possible and above all survive!

For that, become an experienced soldier, expert in zombies ... and especially in their annihilation! Benefit from 3 different weapons: a sword, a bow and a pistol!

Evolve in an extraordinary setting and land a new dice to face more angry zombies in each round.

Adventure tempts you, eh?

So download ZAJE now!
